https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pm5JawA75k5nSJ7wiTjyXsJ0Ntf.jpg Dante spends his days between factories, skateboards and corpses, but the only thing he cares about is the Death Metal band he plays in with his best friends. Lucy, the girlfriend of his comatose brother, comes to visit, and here presence will cause chaos, confusion, but also hope. Death To Summer
